parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Flags

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the global owner of a flag. A getter for [[setFlagOwner]]. Note that owner of a flag is [[Object]] rather than [[Number]], as how it is usually with other [[owner]] commands

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''flagOwner''' flag

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> flag: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] -  The person or vehicle that owns the flag is returned. If used on anything else than a flag, the returned value is [[objNull]]. If the flag is on its pole, the return value is NULL. If the flagowner is dead, the return value is the name of the soldier model.
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_person = [[flagOwner]] _flagOne;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[flag]], [[setFlagOwner]], [[setFlagSide]], [[setFlagTexture]], [[flagSide]], [[flagTexture]], [[setFlagAnimationPhase]], [[flagAnimationPhase]], [[forceFlagTexture]], [[getForcedFlagTexture]], [[Flag Textures]]
</value></part></template>
